body: This was not as bad as far as ntr goes, tbh. I mean, sure, it sucks that the girl was a hoe that was boinking the teacher and only got close to MC at his behest, but, like, did they really do anything bad to him? Like, the teacher was worried about his student and sent someone to get him out of his shell, and the girl just wanted to get some dick so she acted friendly. Sure, it's a somewhat ''fake'' friendship, but is it really that bad? She wasn't doing it out of malice nor did she do anything bad to him other than break his heart, and even that wasn't on purpose since he wasn't supposed to have found out about all that. Heck, she was even willing to ride him as well, so it might've given him a boost of confidence. The problem is that he fell in love with the first one to reach out to him, but that was HIS problem, not hers.
Lont bgst, tenang MC masih banyak cewek di luar sana
Well that was trash wtf
What a sick twisted bitch
@troncol shes not necessarily obsessed with the teacher, she just likes dick and shes willing to fuck anyone

At least he found out what's she's really like before he got serious with her but I say he should've kept the look he had before. Just forget about her and move on kid. But I agree with bungeelove about taking those pictures
I'm proud of you boy!

My opinion about the story : I'm not blame the MC if he leave that girl, his soul or character not ready yet. He is still highscool student maybe between 15-17 y.o. And off course we talk about Japan where status or position among the people very strict and separate like respect to the elder, respect to the senior or something like that even they are evil or doing bad thing with us.
FUCKING WHORE
It sad was he wasn’t crying because she was fucking the teacher, but their friendship wasn’t even real
Lmfao that title drop tho
This was kinda funny XD
He should just take some pics of her with the teacher they would be fucked and ignore her for the rest of his life
True enough man you are fine by yourself
@kamichinko agreed
This remind me even netorare has its limits
The title cuts deep like a knife.
@kamichinko - I agree with that... the only things I would add is using a condom to prevent her for passing the teacher responsibility/pinning a child to him...
True but he should have fucked her a few times, kept his new look, and treat her coldly after that.

She's a total b*tch. Not because she's bonking the teacher... but because she isn't really his friend. The teacher put her up to it... for what reason? I don't know... but she happily obliged him because she's weirdly obsessed with her teach. Again she couldn't care less about the dude, she just wants to get on her teacher's good side.
